questions.question: What is the main difference between singleton and conjunctive visual search

answers.a: Singleton search involves searching for a specific color, while conjunctive search involves searching for multiple colors.
answers.b: Singleton search is faster and more accurate than conjunctive search.
answers.c: Singleton search involves searching for a target with a single distinct feature, while conjunctive search involves searching for a target defined by a combination of features.
answers.d: Singleton search is more challenging than conjunctive search.
